message:
When it comes to `HostingEnvironment.QueueBackgroundWorkItem`, how are unhandled exceptions handled in the called background work? anything special or do they just bubble up? Been googling forever and all I find is vague mentionings that they may kill the process. What if you put `HostingEnvironment.QueueBackgroundWorkItem` in a `try`, does the `cathch` prevent it from breaking?

Hopefully I receive your reply before I have to make a sample app :)
